data.expected_result: The emoji should appear on the chatbox.
data.short_description: When in potrait mode in emoji searcher then switch to landscape mode before clicking on an emoji does not show up the emoji in the chatbox.
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on emojis icon while in potrait mode. - Tap on search button. - When in emoji searcher interface, switch to landscape mode in your phone. - Tap on an emoji.
